title: Bug 91912Request for a new type of relationship in the structure model
description: Bug 91912Request for a new type of relationship in the structure model
EB: Declare soft relationships are currently 'advises' and 'advised by'relationships.Would it be possible to add 'softens' and 'softened by'(or 'softens exception at' and 'exception softened by') relationships to thestructure model?
